prompts: Create a small, purple bat-like Pokemon with big ears and a mischievous grin.
I want a Pokemon that can fly stealthily through forests and has a sonic attack.
Generate a cute, winged creature with bright yellow eyes and a purple body.
Make a tiny, dragon-type Pokemon that evolves into a larger, more powerful form.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses sound waves to navigate and communicate with others.
Design a nocturnal Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a playful nature.
Show me a dual-type Pokemon that can master both flying and dragon abilities.
